LightningComponentBundle.description: Fetches a single record with specified fields and returns it as an SObject

propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: Object API Name
propertyType.description: Select the API Name of the SObject to fetch

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: The API name of the object (e.g., Contact, Account, rstk__poitem__c)

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: The ID of the record to fetch

property.name: fieldList
property.label: Field List (CSV)
property.description: Comma-separated list of field API names to retrieve (e.g., Name,Email,Phone)

property.name: outputRecord
property.label: Output Record
property.description: The fetched record with all specified fields
